/>
X.i.2.B.3.c
.
MST Protocol and FDCs
MST claims require special handling and contact with the claimant.  Development to a claimant that aligns with MST protocol will not be an exclusion from the FDC Program.  Do
not
exclude MST claims from the FDC Program based on
a telephone call to a claimant to inquire as to whether or not any other claims of the MST have been filed, or
development to a claimant for an incident report.
Reference
:  For more information on notification requirements for special issue claims, see
M21-1, Part III, Subpart i, 2.B.1.e
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section B - Processing Fully Developed Claims (FDCs)
citation: Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section B
